attributes.additional_details:
Energy suppliers will apply for the 'discount' and the Government meeting the costs.
With the public then paying the govt back automatically by equal £40 instalments over the next five years.

This rigid scheme is extremely flawed for people moving or sharing homes over the next 5 years.
Millions of struggling people could face paying back a 'loan' in which they never even needed or used.

Fairer proposals to tackle the UK energy bill crisis must be found.
attributes.background: The £200 Energy Bills Rebate is in fact an enforced loan on millions of people who would rather not to pay it or can't.
